SELECT
FROM user_dept ud INNER JOIN dept d ON d.dept_id = ud.dept_id INNER JOIN dept_menu dm ON dm.dept_id = d.dept_id INNER JOIN menu m ON m.menu_id = dm.menu_id WHERE ud.user_name = #{userName}

SELECT
FROM user_role ur INNER JOIN role r ON r.role_id = ur.role_id INNER JOIN role_menu rm ON rm.role_id = r.role_id INNER JOIN menu m ON m.menu_id = rm.menu_id WHERE ur.user_name = #{userName}
